# poisplot

```{r}
library(poisplot)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)

data <- data.frame(y = c(-3/4,-2/3,-1/2,0,1,2,3))
data$x <- 1:nrow(data)

gp <- ggplot(data, aes(x = x, y = y)) +
  geom_hline(yintercept = 0, linetype = "dotted") +
  geom_line() +
  geom_point()

gp + scale_y_continuous(labels = percent)
```

```{r}
gp + scale_y_continuous(labels = percent, trans = nfold_trans())
```
